Title: How to Lead With Intentionality and Purpose with Jordan Lee Dooley
Description:
Join us as our host, George Kamel, talks to Jordan Lee Dooley, an entrepreneur, a podcaster and a bestselling author. Jordan explains how to use your drive to propel you forward—and how to be content with where you’re at. She also gives you tips that'll help you navigate when life happens and things get off track. Later in the episode, George chats with Chris Campbell, the senior vice president of Financial Coaching at Ramsey Solutions, about how Chris’ habits have helped him level up as a leader. Then Chris shares some key questions you can use to grow your self-awareness and leadership.

 

You’ll learn:

  • Why you might be leading with the wrong intentions
  • Why failure can be your biggest opportunity
  • The habits successful leaders have
  • Four questions to make you a more effective leader
